ygData.subject: Updated PacMan Evolver
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve updated the parameters file in my PacMan AI evolver at https://sourceforge.net/projects/aipac I changed the AI Mode from Windowed to Global.  Global

I've updated the parameters file in my PacMan AI evolver at 
https://source=
forge.net/projects/aipac

I changed the AI Mode from Windowed to Global.  G=
lobal doesn't 
produce as interesting set of controllers, but it may allevi=
ate the 
crash problems some have experienced.  I also cut down the number =
of 
replicates on each run from 10 to 5.  This should produce a more 
inter=
esting experience.

Also remember that the PacMan Visualizer will not opera=
te unless you 
press the 'B' key.  Once you do press 'B', PacMan will run t=
hrough 
his maze after each generation using the current best controller.  =

Pressing 'B' again, will toggle the visualizer.  Be patient after 
pressin=
g 'B' as it takes a little while to get to the end of the 
generation.

I'm=
 working on determining the source of the crash some have 
experinece - ple=
ase test this and let me know if it is still a 
problem.  I'm also working =
on some other enhancements many of which 
are based on feedback from users.=


-Kirk
